Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Toby \To"by\, n.; pl. {-bies}. [Perh. from the proper name.] A small jug, pitcher, or mug, generally used for ale, shaped somewhat like a stout man, with a cocked hat forming the brim. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
toby n : a drinking mug in the shape of a stout man wearing a three-cornered hat [syn: {toby jug}, {toby fillpot jug}]
